TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_nipuluma-balu_nu_lukut,_balu_no_lokot, title = nipuluma-balu_nu_lukut,_balu_no_lokot, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/nipuluma-balu_nu_lukut,_balu_no_lokot} }

S.FORM: == Lukut == u siwkay nu nipaluma u sanek nu nipaluma malaheci tu imelang pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u zuma a cidekay a kamu, saungay misapayu' a cidekay u sulit nu zuma a kamu-Hulam atu Amilika
== Lokot == o siwkay no nipaloma o sanek no nipaloma malaheci to imelang pasobana i cacodadan a lacol o zoma a cidekay a kamo, saongay misapayo' a cidekay o solit no zoma a kamo-Holam ato Amilika
